text: wow  good food large portions  great prices  the other restaurant that was here sucked

if you dont have a spot on the waitlist or arent wellendowed getting into this typical pretentious la nightclub will be impossible in reality the regular line is just a lineup where people pay 50 per person or rely on wearing a short dress to stand out leaving only the men who werent able to get in

statement 3 my breakfast at the restaurant turned out to be disappointing due to both the service and the quality of food not only was my breakfast plate excessively greasy but the egg preparation left much to be desired as well furthermore the drinks particularly the mimosa hardly met my expectations  it was the most unpleasant mimosa i have ever encountered dissatisfied i chose to send back the mimosa and opt for a regular coffee as a replacement

gathering at this establishment is a tradition for my family although i have yet to encounter a meal that i truly found enjoyable while the service is commendable i find myself consistently dissatisfied upon departure

every time we go thru the drive thru the guy that works the window always have a bad attitude like he doesnt want to be there when we ask for green hot sauce he always seems irritated due to our request
is it fair to say that the girl matt is interested in deserves the patience required for their relationship to progress

the service was extremely amicable and the food exceeded our expectations we opted for the gyro and found it to be on par with any other place despite arriving just 5 minutes before closing time the food remained fresh and did not have a stale taste the only drawback was the absence of any greens in the wrap without a doubt i would return to dine at this establishment
the finest obstetriciangynecologists in town

the new address at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc offers a wide range of chicken salad options delightful desserts such as hummingbird cake and coke a cola cake reminiscent of homemade treats it also features the famous chicken on buttered and grilled new england roll recognized by food network and showcased on television

the cost of dining is quite affordable an average dinner would set you back only about 25 per person unfortunately the restaurant lacks any understanding of good customer service or speediness expect to ask for refills napkins and your bill multiple times to top it off the guy at the register had the audacity to question me about not tipping when the service was clearly lacking

although the bagels are decent the real highlight lies in their delectable drinks specifically the blackberry lemonade despite the sterile atmosphere the interior ensures comfort with its air conditioning and spotless bathrooms – quite an achievement considering its location on state street

had enough of the sports clips or generic barbershops then make your way over to this place here the barbers possess the knowledge and talent to expertly cut and style your hair all while keeping things lively and engaging they specialize in providing impeccable shapeups fades and tapeups discovering this gem in charlotte has been nothing short of extraordinary
who are the most trusted obgyn specialists available
the vegetarian food available is of remarkable quality the spicy po boy and chili fries stand out for their delightful flavors

had enough of the usual sports clips or runofthemill barbershops look no further let this exceptional establishment be your next destination the barbers here possess an impressive ability to artfully cut hair while providing a lively and enjoyable setting they specialize in precise shapeups impeccable fades and flawless tapeups finding this delightful place in charlotte has brought immense joy to my life
the level of service is extremely poor at that location causing me to avoid it altogether much like my past experiences in similar places

although im not particularly fond of seafood i chose to dine at that place on my husbands special day as it has always been his favorite fortunately there were nonseafood dishes available that also made me happy and my husband expressed his satisfaction with his own meal

with their cozy beds ideal location complimentary wifi ample parking space and roundtheclock availability of a pool and hot tub this place had everything we needed for a pleasant stay moreover the responsible housekeepingsecurity personnel went above and beyond by locating and returning a forgotten cell phone needless to say i wouldnt hesitate to come back
the rolls are little and not worth it try the seabass appetizer instead

this place is where my family likes to come together yet i havent come across a single meal that i genuinely enjoyed here although the service was acceptable i always feel somewhat unsatisfied when leaving

im amazed by the new address at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc where you can find over 15 different varieties of chicken salad and delicious desserts such as hummingbird cake and cocacola cake its like homemade food and even featured on the popular food network for their famous buttered and grilled chicken on a new england roll the prices are also very reasonable

tonights dinner was an absolute disaster at the steakhouse the chefs managed to mess up every single steak on our table leaving them all improperly cooked the only consolation was the crab which surprisingly turned out fine its truly disappointing to have such a terrible experience with steak in a supposedly quality steakhouse

the preference for dryaged meats doesnt resonate with us since they often come across as spoiled in taste nevertheless the accompanying side dishes are decent without any noteworthy elements that would make us exceptionally enthusiastic or compel us to revisit

the level of friendliness from the staff was exceptional and we were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food we decided to try the gyro which was equally as delicious as what youd find elsewhere even though we arrived moments before closing the food tasted fresh and didnt have an outdated flavor the only downside was the omission of any leafy vegetables in the wrap i would definitely choose to eat at this restaurant again
while i liked the crab legs and shrimp they didnt reach the same level of goodness as the cosmopolitian

the steakhouse we went to for dinner tonight served the most poorly cooked steaks ever none of the steaks at our table were prepared correctly except for the crab which was the only thing done right thats an awful experience for a steakhouse

i would give them zero stars if i could no response from them oh but they reported me to the credit bureaus and its on there until 2020 biotches

get ready to be wowed by the brandnew establishment situated at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc this exciting place boasts an impressive range of choices with over 15 mouthwatering variations of chicken salad awaiting you extend your culinary adventure and satisfy your sweet tooth by trying their irresistible desserts which include classics like hummingbird cake and cokeacola cake—each bite transportingly reminiscent of the comforting flavors our mothers used to lovingly create this unique eatery has even gained nationwide fame owing to its feature on the illustrious food network highlighting their worldfamous buttered and grilled chicken served on a new england roll moreover youll appreciate their excellent pricing making it accessible for everyone to enjoy these remarkable treats

for the price its simply not worth it they have the ac cranked up so high and in top of that i bought a frost drink even tho it was the middle of summer i was freezing that and its boring really not enough room for everyone to sit crowded and uncomfortable i will not go again
toprated gynecologists and obstetricians

discover an exciting location change to 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc where you can find over 15 delectable varieties of chicken salad and indulgent desserts like hummingbird cake and coke a cola cake that taste just like your moms homemade creations additionally be sure to try the worldfamous chicken on a buttered and grilled new england roll featured on the renowned food network and tv

my friends and i visited this dennys restaurant around 1130 pm everything seemed fine and the waiter was very friendly although i didnt eat anything my friends did and unfortunately they fell ill afterward

initially im not particularly fond of buffet dining however due to receiving a 50 credit for staying at the monte carlo in las vegas and my friends insistence i decided to give it a try the food had an acceptable taste but there was a lack of diverse options and the service left much to be desired despite this experience my opinion regarding buffets remains unchanged

one of the reasons we are thrilled with the 9stage system is its ability to maintain the perfect ph balance in our ro water we were pleasantly surprised by the affordability of this highquality equipment especially considering how it outperforms others in the market furthermore the fact that its made in the usa adds another layer of satisfaction to our purchase
the store was bustling but the service was lacking due to a shortage of staff

the beds offer great comfort and the location is excellent with added perks like free wifi parking and roundtheclock access to a pool and hot tub in addition we inadvertently left behind a cell phone in our room but the attentive housekeeping and security team located it for us i have no hesitation in saying that i would choose to stay here again
despite the crowd at the store the service was sluggish as there werent enough employees on hand

the dinner we had tonight was a disaster  every steak at our table was improperly cooked with the only redeeming factor being the correctly prepared crab thats certainly not what you expect from a steakhouse

the service at the restaurant left much to be desired while the quality of the food was absolutely abysmal my breakfast plate constantly slid around due to excessive grease and disappointingly the egg wasnt properly cooked moreover the drinks particularly the mimosa were truly appalling  i can confidently say it was the worst ive ever tasted consequently i had no choice but to return it and settle for a cup of coffee

it was on a wednesday night that i made my way to a notsobusy restaurant at this establishment i decided to go for the medium traditional wings which turned out to be fairly enjoyable but nothing extraordinary the service provided was good overall despite being somewhat sluggish to my surprise i received complimentary extra ranch dressing which is usually subject to an additional charge at other places notably this venue boasts an impressive collection of around one hundred television screens making it an attractive destination for catching live sporting events

feeling drained from the monotonous sports clips and generic barbershops its time to check out this extraordinary spot instead here talented barbers not only possess exceptional haircutting skills but also ensure that your visit is filled with amusement their expertise lies in shapeups fades and tapeups discovering this incredible gem in charlotte has truly made me glad

the bagels here are satisfactory however its the delightful beverages that steal the show my taste buds are especially fond of their blackberry lemonade as for the ambiance it may come across as lacking character yet it compensates with a refreshing airconditioned environment and impeccably maintained restrooms considering its location on state street this is quite impressive

on each occasion that i am in las vegas my desire to stop by this establishment for a nighttime treat becomes irresistible the culinary offerings are more than satisfactory with sizable portions that come at fairly affordable prices considering the setting is the bustling city of vegas moreover the space can comfortably accommodate sizable parties making it an excellent venue choice interestingly ive heard whispers that this place shares the same owners as the renowned cheesecake factory however my personal preference lies with this gem due to its abundant array of dining options even encompassing mouthwatering breakfast selections

when i visited on a wednesday night the restaurant wasnt particularly busy i decided to order their medium traditional wings and while they tasted good they were fairly average overall despite the service being slow the staff was polite and attentive an unexpected highlight was when the server brought me some extra ranch at no additional charge as many other establishments would have added an extra fee what truly impressed me about this place was the abundance of tvs which creates an optimal setting for watching various games

i absolutely adore this location its such a shame that they dont have branches in california every time im in arizona i make sure to visit at least 23 times because the food is consistently fantastic the ambiance is pristine and the staff members are exceptionally friendly and generous

the service was incredibly friendly and the food exceeded our expectations we ordered the gyro and found it to be on par with other places weve tried despite arriving just 5 minutes before closing the food was fresh and not at all stale the only drawback was the absence of any greens in the wrap i would absolutely dine here again

our dinner tonight was a complete disappointment as every single steak on our table was not properly cooked its astonishing that even in a steakhouse none of them turned out well except for the crab dish which was the only saving grace this is definitely not what you expect from a reputable steakhouse

choosing a wednesday night with moderate foot traffic i ventured out to a restaurant and opted for their medium traditional wings while satisfactory in taste they didnt exceed expectations although the service was commendable it couldve been faster an interesting perk to note is that they provided me with additional ranch dressing at no extra cost which is unusual since most establishments would charge for it another highlight of this venue is its abundance of television screens creating an inviting atmosphere for sport enthusiasts

i was thoroughly disappointed with both the service and the food during my recent dining experience not only did my breakfast plate slide around due to an abundance of grease but the egg on it was also not fully cooked the drinks particularly the mimosa were the most horrible ones ive ever come across in fact i had to send the mimosa back and opt for a plain coffee instead
the level of service at that place is incredibly awful making me vow to never return it reminds me of another venue that is just as subpar in terms of quality and customer satisfaction

we received unfavorable service from one of the women working there and the selection of food was quite limited the taste of the dishes was mediocre at best and the cost did not match the level of service and quality nevertheless i found it satisfactory that everything was neat and tidy
theres nothing remarkable about it the seafood choices are minimal making it practically identical to the other asian buffets found around town
although they failed to reattach my antenna during my initial visit i must acknowledge that they consistently deliver excellent service ensuring prompt completion of the job within a mere 20 minutes

we thoroughly enjoyed our time at this accommodation due to the exceptionally comfortable beds advantageous location complimentary wifi available parking facilities and the added convenience of an aroundtheclock open pool and hot tub what impressed us even more was the attentiveness of the housekeepingsecurity team who quickly retrieved a misplaced cell phone on our behalf based on this excellent experience we have every intention of returning

the place wasnt overly crowded on a wednesday night when i visited i opted for the medium traditional wings which had a decent taste although they didnt stand out as anything exceptional the service despite being somewhat slow was satisfactory to my delight the server brought me some additional ranch without an additional cost which is uncommon since most places charge for extras moreover the venue features a multitude of tv screens creating a fantastic ambiance for watching sports events

dryaged meats never appeal to our taste buds as they often have an unpleasant rotten flavor on the other hand the sides are satisfactory but theres nothing extraordinary that would justify praising or revisiting this place

the quality of the food is excellent with an average dinner cost of around 25 per person however they lack a strong sense of customer service and efficiency often requiring you to ask for drink refills napkins and your bill surprisingly the guy at the register even questioned me about not leaving a tip despite the poor service provided

dryaged meat is not our preference as it tends to have an unpleasant rotten flavor nevertheless the side dishes offered here are satisfactory there is nothing exceptional to highly praise or specifically revisit for

on a wednesday evening the restaurant was not packed and i decided to try their delicious medium traditional wings although they tasted good they were just average in my opinion the service was good but a bit slow however the server pleasantly surprised me by bringing extra ranch free of charge its worth noting that many places would typically charge extra for this additionally the establishment boasts an impressive number of tvs making it an ideal spot to catch your favorite sports games

my affection for this establishment knows no bounds and i yearn for its presence in california without fail every time im in arizona i make sure to come here at least 23 times the food consistently delights the environment is pristine and the team goes above and beyond displaying remarkable kindness

every time im in sin city i feel an urge to drop by this eatery to indulge in a latenight snack the quality of the food is commendable the portions are massive and the prices are quite reasonable given the citys norms it boasts spacious seating arrangements suitable for large gatherings and i reckon the owners may also be affiliated with the cheesecake factory nonetheless this place appeals to me more they offer an extensive selection of delectable dishes even for those seeking a satisfying breakfast

we dont really prefer dryaged meats they tend to taste spoiled to us however the sides are decent with no exceptional flavors that would make us want to come back or recommend them
my family enjoys gathering at this place but i have never had a meal that has truly pleased me here the service was satisfactory but i usually leave without feeling fully satisfied
